title: Talon had a silence for years, and it was always considered balanced.
body:
Why would they remove something that was iconic and part of his kit for years?

Surely there could have been other changes.

It's kind of baffling really.  The silence isn't what made Talon OP.  For the first 6 months of Season 4 Talon wasn't even considered a viable pick.  I remember during LCS someone picked Talon and there were a dozen threads about why Talon was a garbage champion and what a terrible pick he was.  

I don't understand how Riot's balance team can be so ignorant to their own game.
